LanguageData.Gun_AWP.label: 精密国际AWP
LanguageData.Gun_AWP.description: An autoloading anti-materiel rifle with a compact bullpup design allowing it to be operated and carried by a single person. Used to destroy walls. Low fire rate, high range, extremely high damage and accuracy.
LanguageData.Gun_AWP.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_AWP.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_AWP.tools.2.label: muzzle
LanguageData.RF_Gun_ARFifty.label: 阿玛莱特AR-50狙击步枪
LanguageData.RF_Gun_ARFifty.description: A heavy and accurate, military-grade bolt-action rifle chambered for .50 calibre bullets. Its weight and muzzle brake significantly lower recoil. Average firerate, very high damage, accuracy and range.
LanguageData.RF_Gun_ARFifty.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.RF_Gun_ARFifty.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.RF_Gun_ARFifty.tools.2.label: muzzle
LanguageData.RF_Gun_HecateII.label: Ultima Ratio 赫卡特 II
LanguageData.RF_Gun_HecateII.description: A special application scoped rifle with a long muzzle break and wooden stock. Packs and ton both in battle and when carried, greatly slowing any wielders pace. Used to destroy walls. Low fire rate, high range, very high damage and accuracy.
LanguageData.RF_Gun_HecateII.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.RF_Gun_HecateII.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.RF_Gun_HecateII.tools.2.label: muzzle
LanguageData.Gun_ATR.label: PTRD-41 反坦克步枪
LanguageData.Gun_ATR.description: Anti tank rifle, with special armor piercing penetration rounds.
LanguageData.Gun_ATR.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_ATR.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_ATR.tools.2.label: muzzle
LanguageData.Gun_TAMSR.label: SRS99 AM 狙击步枪
LanguageData.Gun_TAMSR.description: The sniper rifle system Anti-Materiel, more formally known as the Special Applications Rifle, Caliber 14.5 mm, SRS99, is a United Nations Space Command sniper rifle.
LanguageData.Gun_TAMSR.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_TAMSR.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_TAMSR.tools.2.label: muzzle
LanguageData.Gun_M82Gun.label: 巴雷特 M82A1 SASR
LanguageData.Gun_M82Gun.description: The M82 is a recoil-operated, semi-automatic anti-materiel rifle developed by the American Barrett Firearms Manufacturing company. It is used by many units and armies around the world. Despite its designation as an anti-materiel rifle, it is used by some armed forces as an anti-personnel sniper rifle. Very high damage, long range and very good accuracy.
LanguageData.Gun_M82Gun.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_M82Gun.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_M82Gun.tools.2.label: muzzle
